title: I have a serious problem with my Pixel 4XL
content:
I hardly bought the Pixel 4XL.
Order number GS.1410-3187-0577
Four rejections were made on the Google Store.
I live abroad. So really hard, hard to buy.

But after one month of use, I had a problem.
The Pixel 4XL camera does not work.
Many people in the community have identified the same problem.
I talked to "Gold Product Expert" "Salim" in this article.

https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/25493208?hl=en#  

Safe Mode, Airplane Mode, Clear Camera App Cache Data, Factory Reset
I did everything but the camera app didn't work.
He said it was a hardware problem.

So I write an e-mail.
My opinion is firm.
If you send me a Pixel 4LX with the same problem that I purchased from Google,
I will transfer the data and send back the problematic Pixel 4XL.
If this is not possible I want a refund.
I will be very disappointed at Google if you do not send the Pixel 4XL without any problems.
If you would like a refund, please let me know the address I need to send.

If Google doesn't implement my opinion on this issue,
I will be very disappointed with Google.
